content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I get the highest price possible for my property. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am considering 500 Euros per month. This is the minimum price I am willing to pay.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. While I appreciate your interest, I am afraid that I cannot accept this price. As a landlord, I want to maximize my gains, and I believe that a higher rental price is more reasonable for the size and location of the apartment. May I suggest that we discuss a higher price range?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate. What do you suggest?

Please note that I am a student and my budget is limited. Therefore, I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.

I am also very responsible and dependable, so I am sure I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.

I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I am open to discuss any terms and conditions that you may have.

Please let me know what you suggest.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Aziz. I understand that you are a student with a limited budget, and I want to be fair to you. However, as a landlord, I need to consider my financial needs as well.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe that a rental price of 600 Euros per month is reasonable. This price is still within your budget, and it also allows me to cover my expenses and maximize my gains.

In terms of terms and conditions, I am open to discussing a lease agreement that is mutually beneficial. I would like to see a security deposit of one month's rent, and I would also require that you pay the rent on time each month.

I hope that we can reach an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
